title: [Proposal] Allocate incentives to PancakeSwap farm
body:
Original Author(s): rayanami
Forum proposal: https://forum.truefi.io/t/proposal-pancakeswap-liquidity-pool/470

Summary: 
- This proposal seeks to allocate 500,000 USD worth of TRU to be used towards PancakeSwap liquidity incentives expected to run for 3 months.

Background:
- Proposal aims to grow TrueFi’s audience on Binance Smart Chain, increasing liquidity and utility for TRU.
- Expected dev work for this proposal is minimal; TRU is already tradable on Binance Smart Chain (https://bscscan.com/token/0xb4fcdcb8a0b29247466720ff81587d1a6f4fc4d7).

Details:
- Emissions for this proposal would total ~1.5 million TRU distributed over a 3-month period (based on $0.32 TRU price as of writing on April 23, 2021). 
- TRU emissions for this proposal would be provided from the incentive allocation of the TRU token supply. 
- Proposal would represent emissions of ~17,000 TRU per day for 90 days, an increase of 6.4% on top of current emissions of 271,244 TRU per day to existing pools, including the upcoming Sushiswap TRU/ETH farm.
- Incentive program would take effect upon integration by the PancakeSwap team.
author: 0xFAeF58FE96e2eB81c1180f92730142C3015B8469
